title: Permabanned after 2 games and not that toxic...
body:
I didn't even curse or say half the stuff my warwick / teams were flaming me, calling me %%%%%%, %%%%, etc. I think this is so undeserved and if you saw my team's chat logs you would agree. I know you guys all tired of this i don't deserve to be banned bs but i seriously think this is unfair. It's usually 3 games. Please unban me i don't deserve this wth :(

replies.body:
>I didn't even curse

*proceeds to curse all throughout the chat logs*

If you're going to lie then try to at least make it a convincing lie.

You spend allot of time complaining about other players than do you do actually playing the game. You also called for reports as well. Not the worst logs that I've seen but they're definitely punish worthy in my opinion.

Extremely toxic, immature and pathetic, looks like a school brat loosing control and having a meltdown, nothing of value was lost.

If you cannot see what is wrong with your awful behavior, i doubt anyone will feel sorry for you.

lmaoo he has to be a brat no doubt. 

Just for fun you should try reading it and try to figure out where in his mind he thought it was okay to post all this shit on here and beg for perma release.

Thats the real fun< when you try to figure out how they can be that stupid
so you got perma ban have you received temp ban ? chat restrictions? warnings in the past?

Remember that you are fully responsible for all activity on your account, and if suspensions or bans are incurred, we will not be able to modify them.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286

I didn't read all that.  I didn't need to, and that's kinda the point.
You spent more time arguing in chat than playing the game.  Since you are receiving moderating actions against you at all, it's clearly a pattern of behaviour for you.

One that you have _chosen_ to persist in despite all times that you were asked you to stop.

  And that justifies a ban.  Because a ban is next thing to try to get through to you, so you can pay attention and figure out that YOU are a problem.  It's the next step to try to make you understand this.

>Please unban me i don't deserve this wth :(

But evidently, you don't.

And that's why you are perma-banned.

nep2une please. leave the douchebaggery to me

youre suppose to  be one of the positive warriors, lecture him or something about life and social interaction>

you doin good tho keep it up
None of these people will take your side, but will try to correct you no point.
Bro this is seriously bs the warwick was using racial slurs against me and didnt get banned and i was only doing bad for 2 games anybody would agree this is bs rn

The fact your chat log looks that long. is an easy perma ban. I dont even have to read it. Even Riot people dont need to
tip: say what you need to in  7 lines or less without using toxic words.

anything more and you are 90% likely to get into trouble which you did.

But just to humor you and read your stupid comments

 """ """  Hobknocker: ouugh~ pound me harder papi
Hobknocker: "you fucked with the wrong %%%%%s
Hobknocker: lol gg thats what ur mom said when she gave birth to you  """" 


lmao youre an idiot, to have chat logs that long FILLED with many reportable things you said. "

then to come on here to appeal ( in other words, beg) for your perma ban to be gone

LOL get rekt bro.
